TopicTitle: KASE Mission Logs - From Eve to Jool [STATUS: COMPLETE]

Articles.Content:
KASE Mission Logs - From Eve To Jool - What is this mission?

The From Eve To Jool Mission, Also Called Operation Magnum Was a mission in the effort to go to Eve and to Jool then Return safely back to kerbin, Without Refueling. The exception of refueling was Pointless, We only had the exception if we absolutely had no choice. Here's the Mission Patch for Operation Magnus

The mission was a success!

Edited January 6, 2014 by ThatKerbal
Succinct and to the point, but no pics?
